title: Calendar analytics
snippet:
I am looking to build a tool that would analyse the contents of my calendar and provide productivity improvement insights based on :how I spend my time: 
who am I spending most time with in meetings/on calls, 
What company i spend most of my time - Possible to grab domain from email address
which large group meetings take up too much time,
 are there recurring items happening for questionably long time, 
etc.


Something web based (for Google Apps/Calendar) or extending Outlook would be great.

in next phace, i want to add something like Scheduling automation -Example: Calendly.com
